nodes.bodyText: Another way we can do this is by changing validateArgumentTypes logic where we can skip first parameter if it is BalEnv class. But that has effect on normal interop function validation. This also looks good to me.
I also consider that approach, I waned to support the case where people have put the BalEnv to the paramTypes manually as well, this works for both.
Shall we write a test case for object attached interop function with param types.
I think this scenario is still broken, added #26054 for this.
